articles.title: Guests alerted TPG Capital boss he may’ve bought fake artworks of ₹18 cr: FIR - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Bhatia who recently started building his personal art collection told the police that 11 of the paintings turned out to be forgeries | Mumbai news
articles.content: Puneet Bhatia, India head of the US-based private equity TPG Capital, filed a complaint with Tardeo police late on Monday night alleging that he had been sold paintings by leading Indian artists wort… [+5715 chars]
